Name: Fighting For Food
About the game: FIGHT FOR YOU FOOD Fighting For Food is a first-person action game where you are trying to hold a feast for your family at your house. Unfortunately the bugs have invited themselves so you must fight them back by using a variety of weapons and traps. Key Feautres -Race the Clock You have a limited time to be able to prepare for the feast, so don't waste time. -Manage your money Purchase food, weapons and traps. Gain more money by killing super bosses. Use different weapons & traps Choose from different weapons and traps but also figure out which weapons work best to kill the various bugs. Can you beat them all and stop them in their tracks? Or will they ravage your food supply, send you broke and possibly even kill you? It's all up to you.
